statements: UPDATE user_access_logs SET accessed_data = 'Updated Data 1' WHERE log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE user_access_log SET accessed_table_name = 'sensitive_data' WHERE user_id = 101 AND access_timestamp > '2022-01-01';

UPDATE logs SET action='Login' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
